response.original_title: How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal? [[ASistance Support]]
response.overview: To turn off Geek Squad auto renewal, call 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 and speak with a representative. You can also use the toll-free number 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 if needed to confirm cancellation. Make sure to have your account details ready when you dial 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638. For quick assistance, call 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 during business hours. Finally, verify the auto-renewal is off by contacting 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 once more to avoid unexpected charges.
response.title: How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal? [[ASistance Support]]
